segments.text: I am Liu Yi , from China XYZ Company . I ’ d like to see Mr . Thomas , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have an appointment , Mr . Liu ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I am afraid not . I just arrive in town today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr . Thomas is quite busy , I ’ m afraid he won ’ t be able to see you today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you please ask when he will be free ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have a seat please while I call .
segments.speaker: S2
